name: LSJ: episode 2 Playtime
description:
You need to escape, you already managed to lock the others in the playroom. Do not touch them, stay away at all cost.

Key Features:

-Intractable Doors and objects

-Teleporting enemies

-Flash light

The Bitbucket:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/lenny-jox_game-a-week_4/src/master/

Release Notes:

-ver 1.0 full release

Credits:

Lenny Steve Jox

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
